title: Flash is blocked now... need HTML link...
content:
Unless there’s an HTML version of Typophile that I’m not aware of, I won’t be able to contribute while at work.

All FLASH elements have been blocked.

It’s a sad day.
author: Asvetic

comments.content: Thanks Satya, that’ll have to do for now. Google Reader here I come!

If you use Firefox, and can install the greasemonkey extension, you could try my Typophile forum menu script: [http://typophile.com/node/34705](http://web.archive.org/web/20080906205633/http:/typophile.com/node/34705 "http://typophile.com/node/34705")
